DESCRIPTION_ITEM.P:
Cubic/quadratic polynomial linesearch
Finds minimizer lambda of the cubic polynomial q on the interval [blow * lamc, bhigh * lamc] such that q(0) = q0, q'(0) = qp0, q(lamc) = qc, q(lamm) = qm if data for a cubic is not available (first stepsize reduction) then q is the quadratic such that q(0) = q0, q'(0) = qp0, q(lamc) = qc

BIBLIO.SP: C. T. Kelley, "Iterative Methods for Optimization", SIAM, Philadelphia , 1999, Frontiers in Applied Mathematics, 18
